text: MixedModels tests enter an infinite loop in subtyping on Julia master. Is there a good way to debug that?

elements.text: MixedModels tests enter an infinite loop in subtyping on Julia master. Is there a good way to debug that?

text: attach gdb, go to the first frame that entered subtyping and dump the arguments to the subtype test?

text: I was looking into <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/40048> (from before there was an issue) and that's since been bisected to the problematic commit. Good idea about GDB though, I'll try that next time! Though perhaps it could still be useful to figure out why things are going awry in that issue.
